New Records: Anrich Nortje took 4 wickets, a new record for him in this match.
South Africa scored 80 runs, while Sri Lanka scored 77 runs.
Key Match Events: South Africa reached 50 runs in 10.3 overs.
Sri Lanka lost key players like Kusal Mendis and Angelo Mathews.
Anrich Nortje was instrumental in dismissing several Sri Lankan batsmen.
Post-Match Reflections: The match was a pivotal moment in South Africa's journey in the tournament.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the 100th meeting between South Africa and Sri Lanka in T20Is.
